class band.models.Song(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a song in the database.

Variables:

  • title – The title of the song.

  • album – The album to which the song belongs.

  • release_date – The release date of the song.

including all songs in the database.

band.views.register(request)[source]¶

Handles user registration and login.

If the request is a POST, it processes the form data for user creation and logs in the user. If the request is GET, it displays the registration form.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object containing metadata about

  • request. (the)

Returns:

Redirects to the homepage after successful registration or renders the registration page if the form is invalid.

Return type:

HttpResponse
